name: WordPress HTML5 Radio Player-WPBakery Page Builder Addon路径遍历漏洞
product: ["WordPress HTML5 Radio Player-WPBakery Page Builder Addon <=2.5"]
description: WordPress和WordPress plugin都是WordPress基金会的产品，WordPress plugin是一个应用插件。WordPress HTML5 Radio Player-WPBakery Page Builder Addon存在路径遍历漏洞，该漏洞源于路径名限制不当，目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://wordpress.org/plugins/
patch: WordPress HTML5 Radio Player-WPBakery Page Builder Addon路径遍历漏洞的补丁
